content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on requesting evidence from a claimant, including
written requests for evidence
notice of time limits to submit evidence
clarifying issues and claims
claims development by e-mail, telephone, and electronic means
documenting information received by telephone
handling information received by telephone that might affect benefits
referencing information received by telephone in decision notices
, and
managing damaged electronic media
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Evidence Requested From the Claimant
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
